fields.name: employeeId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the employee record.

fields.name: payRunId
fields.description: Identifier for the pay run containing the payslip.

fields.name: periodStart
fields.description: ISO-8601 timestamp for the start of the pay period.

fields.name: periodEnd
fields.description: ISO-8601 timestamp for the end of the pay period.

fields.name: paymentDate
fields.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the payslip was scheduled for payment.

fields.name: grossPay
fields.description: Total gross pay for the payslip in AUD.

fields.name: paygWithheld
fields.description: Total PAYG withheld amount in AUD.

fields.name: netPay
fields.description: Computed net pay in AUD after PAYG withholding.

fields.name: payPeriodDays
fields.description: Duration of the pay period in days.

fields.name: grossPerDay
fields.description: Average gross pay per day across the period.
